description: Try our easy to follow Apricot, Fig & Mixed Seed Bites recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Apricot, Fig & Mixed Seed Bites Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 50g mixed seeds, such as pumpkin, sunflower and sesame

recipeInstructions.text: Line 2 baking sheets with nonstick baking paper.
Beat together the margarine and sugar in a bowl until light and fluffy, then beat in the egg and measurement water.
Sift the flour and bicarbonate of soda into the bowl, adding any bran in the sieve. Add the oats, apricots, figs and seeds, then fold all the ingredients into the margarine and sugar mixture.
Place 24 walnutsized pieces of the mixture on the baking sheets and flatten them slightly with the back of a fork.
Bake the bites in a preheated oven, 180°C for 1015 minutes until golden. Transfer to a wire rack to cool.
